/opt/fsl-imx-fb/4.1.15-1.1.1/sysroots/x86_64-pokysdk-linux/usr/bin/arm-poky-linux-gnueabi/arm-poky-linux-gnueabi-gcc     --sysroot=/opt/fsl-imx-fb/4.1.15-1.1.1/sysroots/cortexa9hf-vfp-neon-poky-linux-gnueabi  -march=armv7-a -mfloat-abi=hard -mfpu=neon -mtune=cortex-a9  -g    --sysroot=/opt/fsl-imx-fb/4.1.15-1.1.1/sysroots/cortexa9hf-vfp-neon-poky-linux-gnueabi CMakeFiles/uartloop.dir/src/main.c.o  -o CMakeFiles/CMakeRelink.dir/uartloop -rdynamic -lpthread
